title: WTB - Becker and Lundgren CHI Off Backs
author: JoeRand

posts.post_title: WTB - Becker and Lundgren CHI Off Backs
posts.post_content: Hoping for some help.  I’m looking for a T206 Becker and Lundgren CHI in off backs… no Piedmont or Sweet Caps.  I’m open to raw or graded, ideally 1.5 - 3 conditions.  Please PM or text me at 407-808-7147 if you have either of these and are open to selling.  Thanks!
